Keme Nzerem bụ Nigerian British journalist na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ a kpọrọ Channel 4 News  kemgbe afọ 2001
Ọrụ ya bụ igụpụta akụkọ mere eme di iche iche nakwa ikwu ka osi mee

Nzerem guru Geography na University of Sussex Ọ mechara nwetakwa nzere nke postgraduate site na-ịgụ maka Broadcast journalism. Tupu ọ gaa rụọ n'ụlọ ọrụ Channel 4news, Ọ rụrụ dika odee ndi  Comic ReliefỌ rụọla ọrụ na Channel 4's  ma bụrụkwa onye nta akụkọ na  Washington, yỌ kwadokwara  ma gosipụta ihe ndi di iche iche dika egwuregwu na More4 News
N'afọ 2002,I onyChannel e na-emepụta egwuregwu, yana onye na-ekerịta ọwa Channel 4, na-ewetakwa mmemme nwanne ya, More4 News
Na 2002, o dere banyere ahụmịhe ya banyere ịga ụlọ ọrụ na-akpụ akpụ akpụkpọ ụkwụ, Richard Reid
N'afọ 2008, Nzerem nwetara onyinye ozi mba ofesi Royal Television Society maka akụkọ maka usuu ndị agha America nke Iraq 2007
